channel.title: iFantasy
channel.description:
[center][center][size=24pt]iFantasy![/size][/center] Welcome to the brand new development "iFantasy!". I've been really bored lately so i've currently decieded to make a new development team to make http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,471238.0.html, (Hopefully will have permission to build off this.) [size=18pt]What we will be doing! [/size] We will be adding Pretty much all of runescape's Special attacks. We will be adding more quests. we are going to make the server not just revolve around Pk'ing, meaning having more minigames, quests and activities for players to do. We Will need to decide on adding some of the latest RS item's such as chaotics, PVP Armors. We will be trying to achieve a player base of over 200. Will add more soon! [size=24pt]Media![/size] No media yet due to the development is just starting, once we make our first update i'll post some media. [size=24pt]Positions![/size] Server Sided Coder.
Name: MSN: Skype: Previous Work; Extra info;
Client developer
Name: MSN: Skype: Previous Work; Extra info; Can you make webclients? yes/no
Graphics Designer
Name: MSN: Skype: Previous Work; Extra info;
Web Developer
Name: MSN: Skype: Previous Work; Extra info;
[size=18pt] Current Developers/designers[/size] All Over Developers; Myself Rash Client Sided developers; No one. Server sided developers; Clawz fury (Jason) Graphics designer; no one Website designers; Amazying I am hoping people would like to help out with this project. PS. This thread is messy and probably doesn't make sense because i kinda Rushed it. PSS. If wanting more information add my msn; jakee_bj@hotmail.com Thank you <3[/center]

@PLayRooney wrote:

[center][center][size=24pt]iFantasy![/size][/center]
Welcome to the brand new development “iFantasy!”. I’ve been really bored lately so i’ve currently decieded to make a new development team to make http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,471238.0.html, (Hopefully will have permission to build off this.)

[size=18pt]What we will be doing! [/size]
We will be adding Pretty much all of runescape’s Special attacks.
We will be adding more quests.
we are going to make the server not just revolve around Pk’ing, meaning having more minigames, quests and activities for players to do.
We Will need to decide on adding some of the latest RS item’s such as chaotics, PVP Armors.
We will be trying to achieve a player base of over 200.
Will add more soon!
[size=24pt]Media![/size]
No media yet due to the development is just starting, once we make our first update i’ll post some media.

[size=24pt]Positions![/size]
